AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: restoration mage
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While [PAWN_nameDef] was magically gifted, [PAWN_pronoun] was never one for violence, and instead devoted [PAWN_possessive] skills to the art of restoration. Any who sought aid would have their please answered by [PAWN_nameDef].
